alert.note: Alert for Anne Arundel; Calvert; Charles; Prince Georges; Southern Baltimore; St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 07 at 4:35AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...POTENTIAL WINTER COMMUTING HAZARD FOR THE BALTIMORE / WASHINGTON METRO AREAS THIS MORNING... There is a potential for hazardous commuting conditions for the morning commute. A period of freezing drizzle is POSSIBLE (a 30 percent chance) this morning across the Baltimore metro area with a light glaze of ice possible on area roads. If this threat does materialize during the morning rush-hour, many roads could quickly turn icy. This could lead to dangerous traveling conditions, multiple accidents, and extensive delays. If commuting this morning, be aware of the POSSIBILITY of significant travel disruptions. Plan ahead by allowing for extra travel time, and consider using public transportation and telework options. Stay tuned for updates on this potential winter weather episode.

area.areaDesc: Anne Arundel; Calvert; Charles; Prince Georges; Southern Baltimore; St. Marys
